review: Doctor was so good with baby. I've visited a few pediatrician in Chennai for our daughter for her vaccinations, and I can say hands down that this was the best experience out of all. Doctor was so frdly with baby and distracted her so well while she was injected. I am so happy to have found Dr. Jisha for all baby's future Doctor visits.
Hospital was very clean and doctor was so friendly and explained well. Kids play area was very to play for kids in waiting room. Good hospital for kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Jisha's way of handling the little patients is excellent. She is very friendly with the children at all times. She explains the situation clearly and has always given 100% correct diagnosis. My child feels very comfortable while visiting her. Great Job Ma'am!!!!

The consultation with the Dr was excellent. We met the Dr for diarrhoea of my son. Dr was very jovial, explained the issue patiently and gave clear explanation on the dosage of the prescribed medication. The kid was also engaged throughout the session due to the cool nature of the Dr. Would highly Recommend her Paediatric care. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jisha is very friendly and she explains the problem that a layman understands. Im highly satisfied with her treatment and her approach to the same. Soon after my first visit I decided to that she will be the paediatrician of my child.  She goes above and beyond to ensure the child is doing good even after we come back from the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Right from the reception to doctor everyone one was so nice. ********* ********* ** ****** she will make us to feel comfortable and confident that's what I expect when we visiting the hospital. Excellent atmosphere and hygiene. I would definitely visit again.
She is very friendly and explaining the medications very detailed for my baby. Handling the babies with care.
100℅ perfect and excellent doctor, I highly recommend without any doubt. 100℅ perfect and excellent doctor, I highly recommend without any doubt.
Good and friendly. Whatever the problem is, she listens everything and suggests mild and exact medicine which cures my little one

review: Dr. Jisha is extremely proficient and very friendly in her dealings with babies and especially if you are first time parents. Being a new mom, she advised, motivated and answered all of my doubts patiently. Having her as our doc for our baby is such a blessing.  I would recommend her 100%.
